other_tests.procedure_name: CT Abdomen with and without Contrast
other_tests.findings: Mild fatty infiltration of the transplant liver, no concerning arterial enhancing lesions identified, esophageal/paraesophageal varices and intra-abdominal collateral vessels due to portal hypertension, small right-sided adrenal nodules meeting criteria for adenomas, stable mild thickening of the left adrenal gland, and no free air, free fluid, or pathologically enlarged lymph nodes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable findings including right-sided adrenal nodules and mild thickening of the left adrenal gland.
